p: Major components of A. majus essential oil were hexadecanoic acid (38%), dihydrocarvone (7%), 6-octadecenoic acid (6.4%) and tetradecanoic acid (4.9%) representing 56.3% of oil. The main compounds of A. visnaga essential oil were carvone (57%) and apiol (18.1%) constituting 75.1% of oil (TableÂ 3).
